      </h4>

        Clients frequently commend Designli for their proactive approach throughout project engagement. For instance, one client noted that Designli consistently anticipated needs by suggesting alternatives before questions arose, enhancing the project&#39;s efficiency. Another client highlighted their exceptional communication, stating that Designli provided regular updates and was always responsive. Overall, the sentiment is overwhelmingly positive, with clients appreciating the team&#39;s ability to maintain clear communication and deliver on expectations without requiring constant prompting.
      </p>

            >MindSea is a Mobile App Development company specializing in iOS and Android development. Their reviews on Clutch.co indicate a strong reputation for effective project management and excellent communication, with 100% of reviewers highlighting their professionalism and integrity. Clients praise MindSea for seamlessly integrating with teams and delivering high-quality products on time and within budget, although some mention cost and resource estimation as areas for improvement.

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        MindSea consistently exceeds client expectations, as highlighted in multiple reviews. Clients praised their excellent project management, timely delivery, and high-quality outcomes. One client noted, &#39;The end quality exceeded my expectations,&#39; while another emphasized, &#39;MindSea went above and beyond.&#39; Their thorough processes and ability to adapt to client needs were also commended, with one reviewer stating, &#39;They exceeded our expectations again.&#39; Overall, clients express strong satisfaction and a willingness to recommend MindSea for future projects.
      </p>

                Unique expertise
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Unique expertise
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        The overall sentiment regarding codebuild_&#39;s unique expertise is highly positive. A client highlighted their significant strength in expertise, stating, &#39;codebuild_&#39;s expertise has been their biggest strength.&#39; Additionally, the client expressed satisfaction with their project management, noting the team&#39;s ability to meet deadlines and budgets while maintaining constant communication. This reinforces the perception of codebuild_ as a knowledgeable and reliable partner in mobile app development.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">

          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="101270"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="180391"
          data-gtm_insight_id="801019"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App Development for Entertainment Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Feb 10, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              codebuild_'s <b>expertise has been their biggest strength</b>.
            </p>

      target="_blank"
      href="/profile/codebuild#reviews"
      title="View codebuild_ Reviews"

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <p class="provider-insight__subtitle">
        Mobile App Development PROJECT HIGHLIGHT
      </p>
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Mobile App Dev Projects for Entrepreneur
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        <span class="provider-insight-highlight-rating">5.0</span>
        â€”  Akveo developed two mobile applications for an entrepreneur. The first app was for ordering clothes that can be customized and the second app was for booking a table and ordering food.

        
        <a

      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients commend Neural Soft Solutions for their proactive engagement and responsiveness throughout the project.       </p>

      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Core Logic has received positive feedback regarding their accessibility and communication throughout the project. Clients appreciated the dedicated point of contact and the availability of the development team via Slack, which facilitated direct communication. The commitment to the project was noted, with careful planning and adherence to schedules. One client remarked on the team&#39;s willingness to assist with ad hoc requests, emphasizing their responsiveness and reliability. Overall, the sentiment reflects strong satisfaction with Core Logic&#39;s accessibility.

    data-title="SolveIt"

    
        data-uid="e91e56ff-1df5-44d7-9d66-ec41e0d8beff"

                    title="Read Full Review on Memory Squared"

They are frequently praised for their professionalism, effective project management, and commitment to understanding client needs, boasting a 100% positive feedback rate across various reviews. Their team is notably recognized for their responsiveness, flexibility, and creative problem-solving capabilities.

        PieSoft has received overwhelmingly positive feedback for their proactive approach. Clients highlighted the company&#39;s ability to integrate seamlessly into teams, demonstrating initiative by addressing issues and suggesting improvements. One client noted PieSoft&#39;s employees acted as full team members, while another emphasized their proactive compliance research, which significantly benefited ongoing projects. Overall, the sentiment reflects a high level of appreciation for PieSoft&#39;s responsiveness and their commitment to understanding and enhancing client needs.

            >Appinventiv is a mobile application development company specializing in iOS and Android platforms. They have received a mix of both positive and negative feedback, with approximately 70% of the reviews praising their technical proficiency, project management, and commitment to quality. However, around 30% of reviews reflect concerns about communication and delivery issues. Many clients commend their problem-solving abilities and adaptability.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Appinventiv consistently exceeds client expectations, as evidenced by multiple reviews. Clients praised their exceptional project management and technical expertise, noting that they delivered advanced features and met tight deadlines. For instance, one client highlighted their ability to engage hard-to-reach communities in challenging environments, while another commended their thorough communication and adaptability. Overall, clients expressed high satisfaction, recommending Appinventiv for its professionalism, dedication, and ability to provide value beyond initial projections.
      </p>
    </div>

  </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently report that Synodus exceeds expectations with their exceptional project management and understanding of client needs. Notably, one CEO highlighted their ability to enhance user engagement significantly and deliver results that improved internal processes by 40%. Another client emphasized their competitive, comprehensive solutions and effective budget management, noting that Synodus consistently delivered more than anticipated. Overall, the sentiment reflects strong satisfaction and appreciation for Synodus&#39;s dedication to client success.
      </p>
    </div>

        Reviews mention Proactive

      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently noted Contra Studio&#39;s proactive approach in project execution. Specifically, one review highlighted their proactive representation of information and effective communication throughout the project stages. Additionally, the studio was praised for meeting deadlines and being attentive to client needs, demonstrating a commitment to collaboration. Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for their proactive engagement, although suggestions for enhanced project management were noted.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Proactive
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently highlight Five Pack Creative&#39;s proactive approach throughout their projects. One client noted the team&#39;s responsiveness and ability to guide decisions, stating it felt like a partnership rather than a traditional vendor relationship. They appreciated how the project manager quickly coordinated with the team, ensuring efficient communication. However, a client mentioned that a tighter timeline limited their ability to address certain features proactively, although they acknowledged this was not a fault of Five Pack Creative.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">

              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Oct 8, 2018</span>
            </div>

              As a project manager, I appreciate their responsiveness and sense of urgency. They're app experts. <b>They've guided me through many decisions and brought items to my attention that I wouldn't otherwise recognize.</b> It feels more like a partnership than a vendor relationship, which is great.
            </p>

            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="1262793"
              data-gtm_insight_id="1967222"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Exceeds expectations
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        FocusReactive consistently exceeds client expectations, as highlighted by a VP of Marketing who noted their ability to deliver projects ahead of schedule and seamlessly integrate with internal teams. Another client, a Design Lead, praised their efficiency and independence, stating they delivered 150 components, significantly surpassing business goals. Overall, clients commend FocusReactive for their talent, responsiveness, and dedication, even in challenging circumstances, reflecting a strong alignment with client needs and values.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1262793"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="157771"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1967222"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Staff Augmentation for Travel E-Commerce Platform</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Sep 12, 2022</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              In almost 6 months the agency delivered around 150 components (inc. updates on existing ones) and brought the whole project completion from 50% to 96%, which <b>exceeded the business expectations</b>. They were very efficient and trustworthy. With an engineer working on the project being based in Kiev during the Russian invasion, it has been a challenging period for Focus Reactive, but even in these dire circumstances - they <b>unexpectedly carried on the work</b> and we went through this period incredibly smoothly.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/focusreactive/157771"
            title="View FocusReactive Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"
            aria-label="Read Full Review"
            data-gtm_provider_id="1262793"
            data-gtm_index="0"
            data-gtm_review_id="157771"
            data-gtm_insight_id="1967222"
          >
            Read Full Review
          </a>
        </li>
        
      </ul>
    </div>

    <a
      target="_blank"
      href="/profile/focusreactive#reviews"
      title="View FocusReactive Reviews"
      class="provider__cta-link provider-insight__cta-link provider-insight__cta-link--reviews-mention sg-button-v2 sg-button-v2--secondary"
      aria-label="View FocusReactive Reviews"
      data-link_text="Profile Reviews Button"
      data-gtm_provider_id="1262793"
      data-gtm_insight_id="1967222"
    >
      Read All Reviews

  <div id="insight-1967222-feedback" class="feedback feedback--reviews-mention">
  <p class="feedback__message">Was this helpful?</p>
  <div class="feedback__buttons">
    <button
      type="button"
      class="feedback__button positive"
      aria-label="Send positive feedback"

      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have expressed satisfaction with Avocado Technology&#39;s reasonable pricing, noting the value received for the cost. One client highlighted that, given the price paid, the quality of work was very good, stating, &#39;considering the price we paid, it was very good and I wouldn&#39;t dare ask more.&#39; Overall, the sentiment regarding pricing is positive, with clients feeling that they received effective service and support that justified their investment.

        Reviews mention Customized support

      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have expressed high satisfaction with Brainberry Group LLC&#39;s customized support, highlighting their attention to detail and willingness to tailor talent needs. Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for the company&#39;s proactive approach and commitment to meeting specific project requirements.

Telesens impressed with their ability to deliver bug-free applications and innovative solutions, though some noted room for improvement in design aspects.

A cellular operator noted the project&#39;s results surpassed expectations, providing efficient interconnect management and automation tools. Similarly, a FoodTech founder praised their project manager for delivering beyond standard competencies, resulting in a flawless mobile application. A Swiss hedge fund manager commended Telesens for their professionalism, stating they delivered more than anticipated, ensuring a seamless collaboration throughout the project.
      </p>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Results-oriented
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Redmonkey has received positive feedback for their results-oriented approach, evidenced by the successful development of a custom product for managing multistory buildings. The client reported over 130 registered home management companies on the platform, indicating effective outcomes. The project management style was praised for its customer orientation and regular communication, contributing to a strong client relationship. Overall, the sentiment reflects satisfaction with Redmonkey&#39;s ability to deliver tangible results.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1819536"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="20951"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1861943"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App Dev for Property Management Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">May 30, 2022</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The project turned out to be good, and it has a good future, now we are on pause because we have a war in our country. But we have our dedicated users who have been using our tool since the very beginning, and we are very proud of it. At the moment, <b>more than 130 home management companies are registered on the platform, and this is just the beginning</b>!
            </p>
          </div>

              MANE provided professional guidance throughout the project and maintained tight controls on delivery, revisions, schedules and budget, always delivering phases on time. Not only did they have as strong a capability as any dev team we had worked with but their <b>communication was flawless</b>, despite the fact that they were an international developer with perceived language barrier. They even <b>understood our vernacular</b> and initiated the kind of friendly banter that made them quite fun to work with.

<meta itemprop="position" content="41">

<div
    class="provider provider-row sg-show-more-less__container sg-show-more-less__container--collapsed provider-row--non-ppc "
    data-is-list="true"
    data-clutch-pid="1525563"

        data-position="1041"
        data-type="Directory"

<button
    type="button"

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Puts the customer first
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        The feedback from clients highlights collective mind DEV&#39;s commitment to prioritizing customer needs. One client emphasized their &#39;care for the client and finding solutions,&#39; while another noted their consistent on-time delivery and responsiveness. The overall sentiment reflects a strong alignment of values and a positive culture fit, with clients expressing high satisfaction and recommending their services without reservations.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1775843"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="233415"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1072681"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Web Dev for Artist Management & Booking Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Sep 18, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Collectivemind.dev deliver everything on time. We highly recommend their services. What did you find most impressive or unique about this company? <b>Speed, care for the client and finding solutions.</b>

      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have expressed a highly positive sentiment regarding AppsGarden&#39;s accessibility and communication. The CTO was consistently available, facilitating effective collaboration.       </p>

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Proactive
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently praised PeakBit Technologies Kft. for their proactive approach to project management. One client noted that the team was &#39;frequently informed&#39; about project status and was &#39;proactive in terms of solving issues or finding out more information on possible optimization factors.&#39; Their willingness to advise on better solutions and their openness to requests demonstrate a commitment to client satisfaction and effective collaboration.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">

          class="provider-insight__review"

          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Website Design & Development for Digital Marketing Agency</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jul 11, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The team was on time. They've delivered before the set deadline. In terms of project management, I was frequently informed about where the process was at, making me involved as well. They were <b>proactive in terms of solving issues or finding out more information on possible optimization factors</b>. When I requested a change or a certain requirement, they responded with openness. In some cases, they advised me otherwise, but it was for the better.
            </p>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Hard working
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently commend ribot Ltd. for their hard work and dedication throughout project engagements. One client noted their &#39;highly responsive&#39; nature and &#39;extremely well managed&#39; operations, emphasizing the commitment of the founders to punctuality and project management. Additionally, ribot&#39;s team was described as &#39;hard-working, kind, and talented,&#39; which contributed significantly to the successful development of an iOS app. Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for ribot&#39;s diligent work ethic and collaborative approach.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="221327"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="140603"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1244034"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">iOS Mobile App Dev for Fashion Retailer</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Oct 10, 2017</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              They are a comprehensive product development shop. I found it impressive that their entire strategy stems from the founder level, which promotes punctuality and comprehensive project management. It also allows for their engineers, product designer, and UX designer to remain good work ethics. They hired <b>hard-working, kind, and talented people</b>.
            </p>
          </div>

    <div id="lm-methodology-accordion" class="lm-only-related-block lm-methodology sg-accordion sg-accordion-large sg-accordion-bordered sg-accordion-contrast">
        <button
            type="button"
            aria-label="Portfolio & Awards"
            class="sg-accordion__title-wrapper sg-secondary-title sg-secondary-title--icon-plus"
            data-dom__data-accordion-status="open"
        >
            <span class="container sg-accordion__title sg-secondary-title__text">
                How the Leaders Matrix Works
            </span>
        </button>

        <div class="container sg-accordion__contents">
            <div class="lm-methodology__column-1">
                <p class="lm-methodology__text">
                    A Clutch Leaders Matrix provides a broad view of the top-performing companies in a particular service or
                    location. Each company featured in a Leaders Matrix is evaluated based on Focus and Ability to Deliver.
                    The size of each circle indicates that companyâ€™s size.

                    <a
                        target="_blank"
                        href="https://clutch.co/methodology"
                        title="Learn More about Leaders Matrix Methodology"
                        class="lm-methodology__link"
                        aria-label="Click LM Methodology Learn More"
                        data-gtm_event_category="click_lm_methodology_learn_more"
                    >
                        Learn More
                    </a>
                </p>
            </div>
            <div class="lm-methodology__column-2">
                <p class="lm-methodology__heading-small"><b>Focus</b> (x-axis)</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__text">Focus accounts for a companyâ€™s specialization within a certain service.</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__heading-small"><b>Ability to Deliver</b> (y-axis)</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__text">Ability to Deliver considers three criteria:</p>

                <ol class="lm-methodology__list">
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Client feedback and reviews</li>
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Work experience and previous projects</li>
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Market presence and reputation in the industry</li>
                </ol>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    </div>
